data.message: can you please tell me how to change to the old facebook layout as i don't want to upgrade it to the current layout.

replies.message: We released the new design to improve everybody's experience, Soka. If there's something you would like to see changed, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1lPrgO4 - Kristen
i want to conecct my facebook with yahoo so plz send me
Kristen, how about taking your "Community Standards" more seriously, and reading reports of cyberbullying and harassment?
ya idont want the new facebook layout!

the new facebook layout looks more like phons interface (android, IOS...)  one !! 
so why should i use it on Pc ?  

#facebook, would be better if you start thinking about basic stuff instead -_-

I agree - I hate the layout on the phone, and now having to put up with it on the pc? thats really annoying. it has taken a lot of my good user experience away. Try installing facebook purity, you can remove some of the unwanted features. and certainly all of the sudden the huge block thats taken up the right side of your screen with recommended paged and ads. Meh, facebook is beocming more and more commercial. >switches to google+ soon<
